name: TASKI / Diversey R1: Cleaning and Sanitising of Bathroom / Toilet surfaces
howToDilute: For cleaning : 20 ml in 1 ltr. water For sanitizing : 50 ml in 1 ltr. water
usage: Spray directly on the surface to be cleaned Leave for 2 seconds Scrub if necessary and wipe surface with clean and dry cloth Replace cloth regularly

name: Diversey R2: All purpose cleaning agen
howToDilute: Normal soiling : 20 - 40 ml in 1 ltr. water Heavy soiling : 50 ml in 1 ltr. water
usage: Floor cleaner for glass and floor like Italian marble, Can be used for wet mopping as well as scrubbing with a machine.Wet moping solution to be taken in bucket/mop trolley Rinse the mop frequently Alternatively use scrubbing machine and pickup direct solution using a wet vacuum cleaner

name: R3: Glass cleaner
howToDilute: 20 â€“ 50 ml in 1 ltr. water for cleaning all types of glasses and mirrors
usage: Spray directly on a dry clean cloth Apply to the surface and wipe with a clean dry lint free cloth Replace cloth regularly Buffing dry

name: R4: Furniture polish
howToDilute: Ready to use, No need to dilute.
usage: Shake the bottle well before use.Spray on a soft dry cloth.Apply to the surface evenly and start buffing.Buffed the floor / surface to high shine.Replace cloth regularly.Note: Do not use on glasses, floors, stairs and laminated sheets

name: R5: Floor cleaner
howToDilute: Normal soiling : 20 - 40 ml in 1 ltr. water Heavy soiling : 50 ml in 1 ltr. water
usage: Floor cleaner for glass and floor like Italian marble, Can be used for wet mopping as well as scrubbing with a machine.Wet moping solution to be taken in bucket/mop trolley Rinse the mop frequently Alternatively use scrubbing machine and pickup direct solution using a wet vacuum cleaner
